trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Bowling Green
There were no other sightings in Bowling Green on or around November 21st 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 5:38 PM Central Time I oserved a brilliant white light moving at approximately 200 knots and approximately 35 drees above the horizon and moving from the West to the NNE. Duration of the event was approximately 2 minutes. No engine sounds were heard, and no navigation lights were observed. As soon as the first object left my sight, I observerd a second, smaller, brilliant white light which was moving slightly faster. It appeared to the north of my position at approximately 60-70 degrees above the horizon. It was moving from the north to the east and would have intersected the path of the first object. Again, no navigation lights were observed, and no engine sounds were heard. The second object appeared to be much higher than the first. The first object was slightly less brilliant than the planet Venus which was also still visible.
